reviewText: I love rebounding but most of the workout dvds get repetitive and have generic boring music. I would rather play my own music, but I do about 3 or 4 moves so I get tired of that too. THIS IS NOT A WORKOUT VIDEO, but a very comprehensive instructional video. The instructor demonstrates moves for lymphatic system. digestive system, balance, aeorbics, circulation, hips,thighs, abs, upper isometric while bouncing, back knees, even a facelift. After I learn the moves I can make my own routines with my own music. YOU DO NEED A STABILITY BAR.
